Title: There's No Place Like Home
Writer: Gabriele Muccino (story), Gabriele Muccino (screenplay), Paolo Costella (screenplay), Sabrina Impacciatore (screenplay collaboration)
Actors: Stefano Accorsi, Carolina Crescentini, Elena Cucci, Pierfrancesco Favino
Plot: A big family that like any other one includes relatives that see each other often and others that rarely meet, reunite to celebrate the 50th wedding anniversary of grandma Alba and grandpa ...
